          <title>
            <string language="en">Absorption spectrum of copper complex ion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Absorptionsspektrum des kupfernen komplizierten 
Ions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Spectre d'absorption de l'ion complexe de cuivre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Spectrum de absorption do íon complexo de cobre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spettro di assorbimento dello ione complesso di 
rame</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φάσμα απορρόφησης του σύνθετου ιόντος χαλκού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Espectro de absorción de ión complejo de cobre</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This graph shows the visible absorption spectrum of the copper complex ion indicating the colour of the corresponding wavelengths.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper complex ion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrated copper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light colour</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">relative light absorption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">transition metal complex</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">visible absorption spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavelength</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt das sichtbare 
Absorptionsspektrum des kupfernen komplizierten Ions, welches die 
Farbe der entsprechenden Wellenlängen anzeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphique montre le spectre d'absorption 
visible de l'ion complexe de cuivre indiquant la couleur des longueurs
d'onde correspondantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este gráfico mostra o spectrum de absorption 
visível do íon complexo de cobre que indica a cor dos wavelengths 
correspondentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico mostra lo spettro di assorbimento 
visibile dello ione complesso di rame che indica il colore delle 
lunghezze d'onda corrispondenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση εμφανίζει ορατό φάσμα 
απορρόφησης του σύνθετου ιόντος χαλκού που δείχνει το χρώμα των 
αντίστοιχων μηκών κύματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este gráfico muestra el espectro de absorción 
visible del ion complejo de cobre que indica el color de las 
longitudes de onda correspondientes.</string>
          </description>
